resources.string: This is a *joke*, *the* certain military aircraft radio-like Twitter client.

It shows your timeline and events (favorite/RT/listed/unlisted etc.) on realtime, in relatively unobtrusive HUD-like manner. You can use this for quickly (or idly) catching up or just watching what\'s going on your world.
* You cannot do tweet/RT/favor/etc. with itself. Please use another client for that matter.
1. Press "start", authenticate with Twitter, and watch.
2. Call the app and tap the "stop" button to quit.
